Texts.Chs: 最后，选择^orange;Metaphysics^reset;。在那里，你只需要选择一个主题，你就能开始研究，只要你有所需的物品，就能完成手头的研究！
Texts.Eng: Finally, select ^orange;Metaphysics^reset;. From there, you need only select a topic, and you will be able to begin research into that topic if you have the required goods to accomplish the task at hand!

Texts.Chs: 首先，找到自己的^orange;S.A.I.L^reset;电脑系统！一旦找到了，点击界面上的^orange;MISC^reset;按钮。很简单，对吧？然后你只需要找到选项 ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset;然后按下按它。
Texts.Eng: First, find yourself a ^orange;S.A.I.L^reset; computer system! Once you have one, tap the ^orange;MISC^reset; button on the interface. Easy, right? Then you need only find the option that says ^green;[FU] RESEARCH TREES^reset; and press it.
How to research new realms of science.

Texts.Chs: 请注意，如果你已经简单地在纳米加工器或改造台处自己制作一个手持^orange;便携式科技控制板^resset;，你就可以无视前面所有的步骤！
Texts.Eng: Note that you can forgo all of the previous steps if you simply craft yourself a handy ^orange;Tech Tablet^resset; at a Nanofabricator or Tinker Table!

Texts.Chs: 你已经收到了这期的《形而上学月刊》杂志！祝贺你！为了充分的遨游在这个令人兴奋的科学研究领域，你需要做一些事情。
Texts.Eng: You've recieved this issue of Metaphysics Monthly! Congratulations! To make the absolute most out of this exciting area of scientific research you'll need to do a few things.
